title: Udemy Psychological Secrets To Triple Website Conversions Tutori
description:
Course Description

Are you wondering what the simplest changes are that you can make to your website RIGHT NOW that can double or even triple website conversions overnight?

    Discover the most ridiculously simple strategies that website marketers and big businesses use every day that are so straight forward, you will probably think it's cheating!
    Are you looking to build a new website and want the cheapest and simplest methods to make money?
    Do you have a website that doesn't get the results you would really like?
    Are you already making money from your website, though know that you could be making so much more?
    Would you like to learn the secrets that the richest internet marketers in the world know, but never share?

This easy to follow course takes videos taken from a live event and puts you in the hot seat to learn strategies and tactics learned over a career of building and optimizing websites.

Strategies used in this course have stunned audiences from small businesses to those with larger online budgets as they discover how level the playing field is and how easy it is to put every variable possible in your favor.


What will I be able to do if I take this course?

    Understand the psychology behind how and why people make decisions on your website home page
    How easy it is to manipulate the thinking of a website visitor by giving them exactly what they want
    The specific three questions you must answer on your website home page
    The specific changes you need to make to your website that can double or triple your conversions


A little about this course:

    This course is so simple, anyone can implement the strategies right away
    Recorded at a live event where attendees paid several hundred dollars per ticket
    Watch it once and instantly make changes to your website to increase profits
    Re-visit the material and implement multiple strategies to ramp up your conversions like the pros


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

Yes, you can take this course out of curiosity and still get your money back with no questions asked! As this is handled directly through udemy, I won't be offended or hold up refunds and I promise we can still be friends after.


What are you waiting for?

If your business is leaking money because your website is under-performing, then you absolutely must turn it around now.


HERE'S WHAT SOME OTHER PEOPLE ARE SAYING:

"I'm not happy. I'm completely stoked, it's now the most beautiful website and looks fabulous and is supremely functional for what we need it to be."
Tina Tower
Owner - Begin Bright

"Pete was there explaining the site and technology to me in a simple non IT way, to ensure we both got the desired result, we have had almost every client on our data base come into the salon expressing their delight at a classy easy to use sight that incorporates and functions with our online booking systems."
Paul and Kylie Grey
Directors - The Gallery Newport

"Thanks so much for your seminar. I found the information you shared very helpful because you identified the key things we need to focus on. You kept the session easy to understand for the non-technical audience."
Jacqueline Ironside
KGA Warkworth Ltd Chartered Accountants

"Loved the facts about how to make the home page of your website above the fold very unique to your target market."
Harrison Carew
Owner - Tactical Ops Paintball

"Pete is so easy to learn from. His approach is entertaining and gets results. He helped me realize for myself what I need in a way I could never have done by myself."
Kelly Vanyai
Intuition To Succeed

"Pete helps simplify the complex and make it doable in relation to buildup a website that speaks to clients in the most useful way when you can't!"
Frina Burgess
People and Performance Consultant


GET STARTED NOW!

Take the course, ask your questions in the course discussions and I guarantee by implementing these strategies you will boost your website conversions, or udemy will give you your money back.

*Guarantees are as per udemy terms and conditions.


Full details
What are the requirements?

    Although it helps to understand how to make changes to a website yourself, it is not important if you are able to hire someone else to make changes
    Have a pen and paper (or device to complete activities) to get full value from the course

What am I going to get from this course?

    Over 25 lectures and 1.5 hours of content!
    Understand the number one thing their website visitor is thinking about
    Easily spot the mistakes on a webpage and know how to fix them
    Make small changes to their website to significantly increase conversions and sales

What is the target audience?

    This course is for people who are interested in the psychology behind website visitors
    This course is for people who want to improve on basic website design to create a website that converts visitors into customers
    Although basic strategy is discussed, previous feedback has suggested people with already successful websites can benefit from ideas presented
    This course is NOT for people who just want a website that "looks good"
    This course was originally designed to be presented in front of a group of business owners, with a combination of website success levels from no results at all, through to multi-million dollar turnovers
